data.what_is:
Voyado is a SaaS company helping retail brands create hyper-relevant shopping experiences, increase customer loyalty, and drive business growth. Their AI-powered customer experience cloud includes a product discovery engine with deep product knowledge to predict and respond to visitors' intentions on e-commerce websites and a multichannel marketing platform that offers invaluable insights and campaign tools for delivering automated and personalized shopping experiences. Headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden, the company has more than 300 employees around Northern Europe, growing rapidly with customers around the world. For more information, visit voyado.com. 

Voyado makes brands easy to love.
data.product_description: The Voyado customer experience cloud lets you create personalized journeys that your customers will love. Voyado enables you to be data-driven throughout the entire customer's lifecycle and empowers you with AI and automation. This allows marketing teams to shift their priorities to more critical strategic tasks and enables the machines to handle the monotonous work. The platform has two integrated solutions that can be combined for hyper-personalization or implemented standalone. Voyado Engage,  a multi-channel customer data platform with marketing automation, loyalty schemes, and campaign management, and Voyado Elevate a product discovery and merchandizing engine enhanced by AI for e-commerce growth.

features.name: Data Import & Export Tools
features.content: Ability to input, modify and extract data from the application in bulk through a structured file.

features.name: Integration APIs
features.content: Application Programming Interface - Specification for how the application communicates with other software.  API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc with other software applications.

features.name: Breadth of Partner Applications
features.content: To what extent are there partner applications readily available for integrating into this product?  Partner applications typically provide complementary, best of breed functionality not offered natively in this product.

features.name: Customization
features.content: System provides sufficient customization to meet business requirements

features.name: Workflow Capability
features.content: Automates a process that requires a series of steps that typically require intervention by a several different users.  Administrators can write rules to determine who and when a user needs to complete a step.  Also includes notification of users when they need to take action.

features.name: User, Role, and Access Management
features.content: Grant access to select data, features, objects, etc. based on the users, user role, groups, etc.

features.name: Internationalization
features.content: Enables users to view and transact business with the same content in multiple languages and currencies.

features.name: Sandbox / Test Environments
features.content: Allows administrators to easily develop and test changes to the CRM deployment.  After changes are made admins can easily migrate the changes into the "live" or "production" environment.

features.name: Performance and Reliability
features.content: Software is consistently available (uptime) and allows users to complete tasks quickly because they are not waiting for the software to respond to an action they took.

features.name: Output Document Generation
features.content: Allows adminstrators to create templates that enable users to quickly generate dynamic documents in various formats based on the data stored in the application.

features.name: Building and Personalizing Emails
features.content: Create and design emails with an editor; manage templates; personalize dynamically This feature was mentioned in 11 Voyado reviews.

features.name: Sending Outbound Emails
features.content: Create targeted lists, schedule and manage bulk email sending.

features.name: Manage Email Deliverability
features.content: As reported in 11 Voyado reviews. Ensure inbox delivery. Includes opt-in management, bounce handling, unsubscribe processing, suppression lists, email preview, spam checking, link validation, and delivery monitoring.

features.name: Automated Email Responses
features.content: Based on 10 Voyado reviews. Set up automated nurturing emails based on events, online activities, and lead scores

features.name: Landing Pages and Forms
features.content: Build customized landing pages and lead capture forms for specific marketing campaigns to maximize conversion and to capture the right qualifying information. 11 reviewers of Voyado have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Dynamic Content
features.content: Based on 11 Voyado reviews. Dynamically customize emails, forms, and landing pages for specific segments of customers and prospects.

features.name: A/B Testing
features.content: Based on 11 Voyado reviews. Test alternate versions of emails, landing pages, and forms. Learn what works, maximize response rates, and increase conversion.

features.name: Mobile Optimized
features.content: Support mobile-optimized emails, online forms, and landing pages. 11 reviewers of Voyado have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Search Tracking and Optimization
features.content: Track performance of keywords and links in major search engines.  Measure search rankings and performance.  Improve page-level SEO with tools to diagnose and improve page performance.  Integrate with Google AdWords. This feature was mentioned in 10 Voyado reviews.

features.name: Marketing Lead Database
features.content: A marketing lead database is the system of record for your most important marketing asset: your leads and contacts. Includes a view of all marketing interactions between each prospect and your company, including website visits, email clicks, scoring changes, and data updates/history.

features.name: Data Quality Management
features.content: Data quality consists of deduplication, cleansing, and appending your marketing database. This feature was mentioned in 10 Voyado reviews.

features.name: Segmentation
features.content: Segment your database and build list of target leads and contacts.  Filter on demographic and company attributes (title, company size, location) as well as behavioral filters and CRM information. This feature was mentioned in 11 Voyado reviews.

features.name: Lead Scoring and Grading
features.content: Automatically qualify and score leads based on demographics as well as prospect online behaviors, including recency and frequency. Assign your own weights to determine lead scores for prioritization.

features.name: Lead Nurturing
features.content: Automate drip marketing campaigns that send relevant messages over time, based on prospect behaviors and pre-defined campaign steps.

features.name: Online Behavior Tracking
features.content: Track which emails a prospect opens and clicks, what web-pages they visit, what keywords they use, even what they say on social networks. 10 reviewers of Voyado have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Automated Alerts and Tasks
features.content: Create tasks automatically and provide real-time sales alerts over email, RSS or mobile device.

features.name: CRM Lead Integration
features.content: Sync lead, contact, account, and opportunity information with your CRM system. This feature was mentioned in 10 Voyado reviews.

features.name: Program ManagementView full feature definition
features.content: Manage marketing campaigns and programs across multiple channels, including online ads, video campaigns, mobile, virtual events, and social media. Create and optimize program assets such as landing pages, emails, campaigns, and lists. Track program objectives, results, and costs to assess the program ROI.

features.name: Event / Webinar Marketing
features.content: Streamline the entire event process, including personalized invitations, registration, reminders, and post-event follow-up.  Integrate with online meeting tools like WebEx, Adobe Connect, GoToWebinar.

features.name: Calendaring
features.content: Maintain a marketing calendar across multiple groups. Manage the calendar for the entire marketing department, from promotions to content to PR.

features.name: Budgeting
features.content: As reported in 10 Voyado reviews. Manage all aspects of marketing investments, including assigning top-down budgets to various groups and divisions, planning marketing spending across programs, tracking open-to-spend, ensuring budget compliance, coordinating work-flows and permissions, and reconciling plans with actual invoices.

features.name: Social Listening
features.content: Monitor what leads and contacts say on sites such as Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, LinkedIn, blogs, and online communities.  Incorporate into your lead and customer DB and use social insights to segment prospects.  Trigger campaigns, and update lead scores.

features.name: Social Sharing
features.content: Add intelligent social share buttons to your campaigns and content.  Track who is sharing your content and driving conversions.

features.name: Social Campaigns
features.content: Schedule automated posts to one or more social accounts; use or integrate with URL shortening services; and measure likes, comments, replies, and retweets.

features.name: Social Media Engagement
features.content: Social apps including polls, sweepstakes, and referral programs can enhance audience engagement.  Include these on your website, landing pages, Facebook pages, and emails.

features.name: Social Media Advertising
features.content: Amplify brand and community stories; Reach customers by social profile and activity; Optimize social ad campaigns in real-time

features.name: Basic Reporting
features.content: As reported in 10 Voyado reviews. Access pre-built and custom reports and dashboards to measure leads by source/campaign/month, email performance, landing page performance, and web and social activity. Create report subscriptions that can automatically send updates to your team and executives.

features.name: Web Analytics
features.content: Track which pages prospects and customers visit and how often they come back.  Capture the history in database for lead scoring and sales intelligence. Use anonymous company look-up to identify anonymous visitors.  Send alerts to sales reps of which of their prospects and customers web activity. 10 reviewers of Voyado have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: ROI Analytics
features.content: Measure leads, prospects generated, pipeline, revenue, investment, and ROI by marketing channel or program. The result is that you can see which marketing investments are generating the greatest return and get visibility into how marketing budget should be allocated going forward. This feature was mentioned in 10 Voyado reviews.

features.content: Based on 10 Voyado reviews. Analyze how leads flow through the funnel by measuring stage to stage conversion rates and velocity.  Allocate pipeline and revenue credit among all the marketing activities that have successfully touched an opportunity as it moves through the pipeline.

initial_reviews.review_title: Elevating Customer Experiences
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Voyado?
As we use both Engage and Elevate, we've found Voyado to be the perfect tool to create great and seamless customer experiences. Having the opportunity to get real-time customer data to create personalized automations, whether it's triggering relevant communication based on certain events or behavior on site. Especially like the intuitive UI of both platforms, and find it really easy to set up new campaigns, marketing automations, get insights and reports and much more.

We've used Voyado since 2021 and we know we can always rely on getting our campaigns delivered - even during peak periods like Black Friday. Elevate has optimized our merchandising with an algohritm that fixed our issue with having to manually sort products and ca also be customized for certain audiences when needed, enabling more relevant recommendations for our customers.

Also what we feel is special about Voyado is its receptiveness to our feedback and the customer service. There's always great and fast service from the team when we're setting up new features or integrations and we've also seen our suggestions shape new features and their roadmap.

What do you dislike about Voyado?
Not being able to personalize content like images, text, blocks etc. on-site by using our segments/target audiences from Engage

What problems is Voyado solving and how is that benefiting you?
Enhanced personalization on our website and in marketing helps us offer a relevant and great customer experience, and ultimately increasing our conversion rate

initial_reviews.review_title: Voyado is a highly user-friendly platform for segmentation, automation, and customer communication.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Voyado?
Voyado's platform is highly user-friendly, fast, and packed with numerous features to provide a solid foundation for a company's CRM efforts. From dynamic segmentation to automations and stylish email templates, it offers a comprehensive suite of tools. They are quick to provide service and work closely with us as customers to address our needs and preferences.

What do you dislike about Voyado?
The only downside concerns the platform's current limited capabilities for advanced analysis. However, Voyado is transparent about this and offers plug-ins for customers who require such features.

Recommendations to others considering Voyado:
If you need a flexible tool for digital communication, go for it!

What problems is Voyado solving and how is that benefiting you?
Voyado has propelled us to the next level in our customer communication. Additionally, Voyado has facilitated our efforts with support for point accumulation and engaging activities tied to our membership club. The platform provides us with a good range of options, from automated customer journeys to manual communications, with dynamic segments based on various attributes.

initial_reviews.review_title: Head of CRM
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Voyado?
It is very easy to use and still very powerful. It is incredible bundle of powerful functions and tools within Voyado Engage. Creating automations, integrations with POS, dataexport for analysis, segmentation tools, a lot of AI-smartness and still simple thing as any to create a simple wonderfull email sendout.
Amazing support, very skilled personel and they are superfast!

What do you dislike about Voyado?
Reports. There ARE some good reports though and I understand reporting is something Voado looks to improve. Still today I need to extract data and create my own reports, datamining and analysis in other enviroments.
The data extractions is extremely rich including all data you need in a straight forward structure.
To be fair, have yet not seen a CRM, MA or CDP with super good native reports.

Also, salestracking based on control groups over a period of time (a campaign).

What problems is Voyado solving and how is that benefiting you?
Creating valuable relationships with customers through relevant communiations and loyalty program.

initial_reviews.review_title: Great platform and dedicated employees
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Voyado?
Voyado is a great platform, both for email marketing and for loyalty. With dedicated account managers and Sucess managers, as well as a smart platform, Voyado has been a helpful tool in reaching our goals. It's easy to use and has a great layout. The online courses are a great way to learn new features, as well as get some insight in best practices. I have used Voyado daily for about two years, and I am very satisfied with the whole platform. The launch of new features are always relevant and helpful when it comes to developing new features for our customers and Loyalty members.

What do you dislike about Voyado?
The support can sometines be a little slow with replies, whihc can delay some processes when it comes to setting up new automations or using new features. They always manage to help, however. For someone who's not invested in the back-end part of implementations and intregration, it can sometimes be a little hard to understand. But the support and our success manager has always been of great help!

What problems is Voyado solving and how is that benefiting you?
Creating personalized experiences for our customers and Loyalty members, as well as creating a community for our Loyalty.

initial_reviews.review_title: Best ESP I've used so far
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Voyado?
Voyado is a super fast and user-friendly product. Compared to other slow, clunky ESPs i've worked with in the past, Voyado feels miles ahead in terms of its capabilities and user experience.

What do you dislike about Voyado?
There's not much to dislike about the platform but the email builder section could be more lenient by introducing more editabile/build access for the client e.g. the ability to edit HTML.

What problems is Voyado solving and how is that benefiting you?
Voyado has a very clean data structure which has helped our business to organise customer data and report on it in a way we struggled with using alternative ESPs. The segment builder and reporting functionalities pull data speedily and effieciently so we can solve any questions from the business within a short time. This has also helped us to revisit our BAU and automated email strateies.

initial_reviews.review_title: Easy to use platform & great customer support
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Voyado?
The Voyado team have been great all the way from scoping, integration to the continued day-to-day relationship we have with our CSM and Account manager. Their support team are also very fast at responding when you have an issue or query. The implementation and various integrations was extremely well project managed by the onboarding team.

As a whole the platform is easy to use. Building emails is quick and simple. Setting up segmentations and automations has been easy - especially with the guidance of the Voyado team who are very approachable.

Bi-weekly meetings are productive and you feel the Voyado are really invested in the sucess of your business. Sharing the voyado roadmap is helpful with future planning and being able to submit change requests/ view other clients change requests and up or down vote what would be useful to you is also beneficial.

What do you dislike about Voyado?
There are some improvements to be made with the in-platform reporting but I believe this is high on Voyado's list of priorities for changes this year.

Send time optimisation would be good - taking into account customers local time zone where possible.

What problems is Voyado solving and how is that benefiting you?
Quick and easy BAU marketing emails
Ease of A/B testing - with our previous ESP this was very manual
Loyalty scheme implementation with their built in functionality
Easier email personalisation

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Voyado?
review_question_answers.answer:
The Voyado team have been great all the way from scoping, integration to the continued day-to-day relationship we have with our CSM and Account manager. Their support team are also very fast at responding when you have an issue or query. The implementation and various integrations was extremely well project managed by the onboarding team.

As a whole the platform is easy to use. Building emails is quick and simple. Setting up segmentations and automations has been easy - especially with the guidance of the Voyado team who are very approachable.

Bi-weekly meetings are productive and you feel the Voyado are really invested in the sucess of your business. Sharing the voyado roadmap is helpful with future planning and being able to submit change requests/ view other clients change requests and up or down vote what would be useful to you is also beneficial.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Voyado?
review_question_answers.answer:
There are some improvements to be made with the in-platform reporting but I believe this is high on Voyado's list of priorities for changes this year.

Send time optimisation would be good - taking into account customers local time zone where possible.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Voyado solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer:
Quick and easy BAU marketing emails
Ease of A/B testing - with our previous ESP this was very manual
Loyalty scheme implementation with their built in functionality
Easier email personalisation

initial_reviews.review_title: Site search the right way
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Voyado?
The machine learning applied to search listings has proven increased conversion. Merchandising strategy is easily adjust based on business goals, as well as the platform being quite extensible to integrate with specific product taxonomy and product catalogue structure.
On the front end the visual presentation of the product adheres to best practices, utilising proven UX and UI guidelines to drive click through and conversion.

What do you dislike about Voyado?
Although the product is highly customisable in terms of functionality, the look and feel is somewhat restricted, mostly as it adheres to best practices, which means it's not as flexible for providing a bespoke presentation.

What problems is Voyado solving and how is that benefiting you?
A more intelligent site search solution that provides more relevant search results, which are auto merchandised based on real transactional data. This leads to an increase in conversion and time saving versus manual control of these site features.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Voyado?
As we use both Engage and Elevate, we've found Voyado to be the perfect tool to create great and seamless customer experiences. Having the opportunity to get real-time customer data to create personalized automations, whether it's triggering relevant communication based on certain events or behavior on site. Especially like the intuitive UI of both platforms, and find it really easy to set up new campaigns, marketing automations, get insights and reports and much more.

We've used Voyado since 2021 and we know we can always rely on getting our campaigns delivered - even during peak periods like Black Friday. Elevate has optimized our merchandising with an algohritm that fixed our issue with having to manually sort products and ca also be customized for certain audiences when needed, enabling more relevant recommendations for our customers.

Also what we feel is special about Voyado is its receptiveness to our feedback and the customer service. There's always great and fast service from the team when we're setting up new features or integrations and we've also seen our suggestions shape new features and their roadmap.

What do you dislike about Voyado?
Not being able to personalize content like images, text, blocks etc. on-site by using our segments/target audiences from Engage

What problems is Voyado solving and how is that benefiting you?
Enhanced personalization on our website and in marketing helps us offer a relevant and great customer experience, and ultimately increasing our conversion rate

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Voyado?
Voyado's platform is highly user-friendly, fast, and packed with numerous features to provide a solid foundation for a company's CRM efforts. From dynamic segmentation to automations and stylish email templates, it offers a comprehensive suite of tools. They are quick to provide service and work closely with us as customers to address our needs and preferences.

What do you dislike about Voyado?
The only downside concerns the platform's current limited capabilities for advanced analysis. However, Voyado is transparent about this and offers plug-ins for customers who require such features.

Recommendations to others considering Voyado:
If you need a flexible tool for digital communication, go for it!

What problems is Voyado solving and how is that benefiting you?
Voyado has propelled us to the next level in our customer communication. Additionally, Voyado has facilitated our efforts with support for point accumulation and engaging activities tied to our membership club. The platform provides us with a good range of options, from automated customer journeys to manual communications, with dynamic segments based on various attributes.

all_reviews.review_title: Best ESP I've used so far
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Voyado?
Voyado is a super fast and user-friendly product. Compared to other slow, clunky ESPs i've worked with in the past, Voyado feels miles ahead in terms of its capabilities and user experience.

What do you dislike about Voyado?
There's not much to dislike about the platform but the email builder section could be more lenient by introducing more editabile/build access for the client e.g. the ability to edit HTML.

What problems is Voyado solving and how is that benefiting you?
Voyado has a very clean data structure which has helped our business to organise customer data and report on it in a way we struggled with using alternative ESPs. The segment builder and reporting functionalities pull data speedily and effieciently so we can solve any questions from the business within a short time. This has also helped us to revisit our BAU and automated email strateies.

all_reviews.review_title: Easy to use platform & great customer support
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Voyado?
The Voyado team have been great all the way from scoping, integration to the continued day-to-day relationship we have with our CSM and Account manager. Their support team are also very fast at responding when you have an issue or query. The implementation and various integrations was extremely well project managed by the onboarding team.

As a whole the platform is easy to use. Building emails is quick and simple. Setting up segmentations and automations has been easy - especially with the guidance of the Voyado team who are very approachable.

Bi-weekly meetings are productive and you feel the Voyado are really invested in the sucess of your business. Sharing the voyado roadmap is helpful with future planning and being able to submit change requests/ view other clients change requests and up or down vote what would be useful to you is also beneficial.

What do you dislike about Voyado?
There are some improvements to be made with the in-platform reporting but I believe this is high on Voyado's list of priorities for changes this year.

Send time optimisation would be good - taking into account customers local time zone where possible.

What problems is Voyado solving and how is that benefiting you?
Quick and easy BAU marketing emails
Ease of A/B testing - with our previous ESP this was very manual
Loyalty scheme implementation with their built in functionality
Easier email personalisation

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Voyado?
the ability to customize is KEY! behavioral data in real time behavior and sales history is so cool! I love the fact that i can tailor to customers every singe time using only ONE interface! it is fast and simple to use!

What do you dislike about Voyado?
I have yet to find anything that I do not like. If I had to pick anything, i would say maybe a better tutorial on how-to get started?!

Recommendations to others considering Voyado:
You have to try this product out for yourself! I recommend finding your own needs then contacting a sales rep and go from there!

What problems is Voyado solving and how is that benefiting you?
I was trying to manage using multiple interfaces which got complicated really fast. I also realized that having REAL TIME data was way more beneficial and sales were doing better!

all_reviews.review_title: This has increased our revenue by 80K in 3 months
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Voyado?
The product was a breeze to integrate into our e-commerce site. However our company has very few commerce items and from those items while our revenue is high, it could be better.

Apptus definitely works for a more straight-forward ecomm site such as clothes, and goods. Being in the appliance sector it's somewhat limiting on how to engage consumers with such an intricate and smart tool.

What do you dislike about Voyado?
There isn't anything I truly dislike, we are still in the process of implementing the product to it's full use and are gaining studies with the interim setup we have in place.

What problems is Voyado solving and how is that benefiting you?
To up-sell and cross-sell appliance accessories to our consumers.

Apptus esales is easy to use and user friendly.
Navigation is very simple.
My IT project, dev, support and QA teams are also very happy with this application as their change management process has reduced lot.
Management is also very happy as reports and dashboards are so cool and easy to present to executives.
In addition to that one can schedule dashboards and report to stream live data right into your inbox.

What do you dislike about Voyado?
Too bright color screen however, we may able to change it.

Apptus tool is easy pretty smooth and the best friend of sales rep.

communication gap between sales rep and end customers, more transparent and frequent etalks as result positive impact on sales.
